name: MarioCraft
description:
I made MarioCraft because no one else would!

Much like a 2D MineCraft in creative mode.

You can control Mario using A and D and jump using SPACEBAR. Mario can also fly by double tapping SPACEBAR and then control using WASD keys. Much like in actual MineCraft.

This game is inspired by Level UP's MarioCraft series.

I'm going to add all other stuff too. So, stay subscribed to my YouTube channel and also this page.

This game is MADE WITH GODOT.
